item.title: Isotope Visual Layouts – jQuery toggleClass
item.description: Isotope Visual Layouts Pro pluginintroduces a click to enlarge feature for box items that are part of the grid layout. This uses a cool jQuery element that changes the CSS class and refreshes the layout of the page. Checkout the demoand click on each box / image. It took me a bit to learn how to do this – only cause I’m not a frontend developer. But if you’d like to add toggleClass to your Isotope WordPress project, then you might like this.
